General.Name: Dovre Group Plc
General.Description: Dovre Group Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides project management services worldwide. It operates in three segments, Project Personnel, Consulting, and Renewable Energy. The Project Personnel segment provides project personnel services for various investment projects. The Consulting segment offers management and project management consulting and software for enterprise level management in Nordic countries. The Renewable Energy segment provides project management and planning and construction for wind farm projects in the Nordic and Baltic countries. Dovre Group Plc operates in the areas of energy, transport, buildings and infrastructure, construction, ICT, mining, pulp and paper, defense, and healthcare. The company was formerly known as Proha Plc and changed its name to Dovre Group Plc in March 2011. Dovre Group Plc was founded in 1984 and is based in Espoo, Finland.
